'Code behind Page - Add local subroutines for the page.
Sub CheckPath
' Check SD path SD_Path = S_Startup.Check("SDCard") SD_PathS = S_Startup.Check("\SDCard") SD_PathSS = S_Startup.Check("\SDCard\")
' Check USB 1 path USB1_Path = S_Startup.Check("USBDisk") USB1_PathS = S_Startup.Check("\USBDisk") USB1_PathSS = S_Startup.Check("\USBDisk\")
' Check USB 2 path USB2_Path = S_Startup.Check("USBDisk2") USB2_PathS = S_Startup.Check("\USBDisk2") USB2_PathSS = S_Startup.Check("\USBDisk2\")
End Sub
